sentence: Spoke to Diago the food services mgr
which contain a line for gratuity when a 125 service charge has already been added
Even after a conversation with the front desk the servers kept knocking on my door with loaded food trays
We felt spoiled by the employees
Our friend complained about it and hotel staffs said that they ran out of chemicals
There were many more things and unfortunately a party of 20 spent a lot of money and received poor service with a hotel that did not meet standards
Service was slow at times but who is in a hurry on vacation people were also polite and very respectful
Drink food service on the beach seems to only be available on the weekends as far as I could tell
If you expect NYC service then go to Aruba or Grand Cayman
do not even get me started on Room Service
fabulous hotel facility sensational beaches all service staff were extremely friendly and helpful
Staying there for a week last 2015 and the room is nice the service
View clean bathrooms nice staff
The staff were fab and made the moves painless and easy
The staff are for the most part very friendly and helpful

Before I go into the negatives of the experience I will say that there were a few people on staff that were wonderful a manager named Boston who we visited with on the grounds about the group we were with a young lady working at the In the Sun gift shop super bubbly looked you in the eye and seemed genuinely kind a taller gentleman name beginning with D who worked as a doorman helpful and talked my husband and I through the best way to walk up to St Timothy Overlook as well as an older woman who worked in the Pizza shack we were getting waters on Wednesday night before bed and she asked how our trip was going and actually seemed genuine in her question
He was so friendly and provided amazing customer service
Had a small issue with our checkin but the assistant manager Ashmo Dorset took amazing care of us and provided outstanding customer service
The looked awesome outside and the staff was extra nice as long as you are nice and talkative
Final note my daughter turned 12 at the resort and the vacation club team had a large cake and balloons card and tshirt for her in our room
